amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Army to assume responsibility for the annual operation and maintenance of the Fox Point Hurricane Barrier, Providence, Rhode Island.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4416 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4416 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chafee. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6384) To direct the Secretary of the Army to assume responsibility for the annual operation and maintenance of the Fox Point Hurricane Barrier, Providence, Rhode Island.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4416 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chafee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4416 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
